scripts.clean: npm run clean-dist && npm run clean-output
scripts.clean-deps: rm -fr node_modules && rm -fr packages/*/node_modules && rm -f yarn.lock && rm -fr */**/yarn.lock && rm -f package-lock.json && rm -fr */**/package-lock.json
scripts.clean-dist: rm -fr packages/*/*.tsbuildinfo && rm -fr packages/*/dist && rm -fr packages/*/.serverless
scripts.clean-incl-deps: npm run clean && npm run clean-deps
